attributes.action: Give NHS workers a wage rise now
attributes.additional_details: Our NHS workers are underpaid we all know that.  Our absolute heroes who work in this sector have a calling and aspire to help others.  For this reason, they are naturally going to be an easy target for low wages. During this pandemic they have stepped up and exceeded our expectations of them.  Please, however small, give them something.
attributes.background: Give our NHS workers a wage rise now to show you care about what they are all going through in dealing with this pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356

Automatic Yearly Pay Rise For NHS Health Care Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565256
